LanguageData.Xangel_Vagrant.backstoryInfo.title: Forer Wanderer
LanguageData.Xangel_Vagrant.backstoryInfo.description: He was a wanderer. That is not an unhappy thing. It must have been a certain happiness that his freedom was not threatened by others.
LanguageData.Xangel_Colonist.backstoryInfo.title: Forer settlers
LanguageData.Xangel_Colonist.backstoryInfo.descriptio: He was a forerunner, but he tried to integrate himself into human life.
LanguageData.Xangel_Farmer.backstoryInfo.title: Faller farmers
LanguageData.Xangel_Farmer.backstoryInfo.description: He learnt about agriculture from man and gained a good understanding of how to grow crops.
LanguageData.Xangel_Butler.backstoryInfo.title: Faller combatants
LanguageData.Xangel_Butler.backstoryInfo.description: Although the Fallers do not like to fight by nature, he recognises the friends he is protecting and no longer hesitates to pick up a weapon.
LanguageData.Xangel_SlaveAdult.backstoryInfo.title: Forer slave
